The Tavern and The Alley are right next door to each other, downtown at 318 + 316 Centre Street on Amelia Island in downtown Fernandina Beach.

THE ALLEY BY AIBC
316 CENTRE ST (NEXT DOOR)
FERNANDINA BEACH, FL
904.310.6088
ALLEY HOURS
M/Tu/W/Th: CLOSED                Fr: 7-10am/5pm-10pm
Sa: 7-10am/11am-10pm
Su: 7-10am/11am-8pm
© Amelia Island Brewing Company

The Alley is a beautifully remodeled space in the heart of downtown 
Fernandina featuring original brick, a full span of rooftop skylights, an 
open air concept with a lush indoor garden, and handmade live-edge wood 
tables.

WHAT IS THE AIBC Story?
In 2016, Amelia Tavern Restaurant & Brewpub opened on Centre Street to provide delicious local food and cold brews to the friends and guests of Amelia Island. As the first wholly operational craft brewery in Fernandina Beach, we'd like to say that our beer is forged from the barrier island current and carved from the sandy dunes that surround us, but really it's just made from the finest malt and hops around.
In 2020, we decided to refocus our brewery brand and expand the restaurant to include a new taproom. Amelia Tavern is now
The Tavern By AIBC
, and our new taproom space next door at 316 Centre Street is known as
The Alley By AIBC
. Together, we are
Amelia Island Brewing Company
, or
AIBC
if you need to shorten it up.
view our menu
Gallery Masonry
When we say “Hold The Line”, we are declaring our commitment to doing it right. All of it. The brewing process. The ingredients. The restaurant. The people. The service. The demeanor. The brand. The outreach. The details. The quality. The atmosphere.
The choices considered, the decisions made, the strategy applied - it is all a collective reflection of our investment in making the right choice, for the right reasons, every chance we get. Hold the line.
A barrier island faces the relentless salt waves, but instead of being worn away by the tide - our pride rolls along, holding strong. We do things differently. Not because it makes us different, but because we have no choice. Every ounce stands atop the reputation of castaways. Every sip is a measure of integrity. Of promises kept. We are who you hoped we’d be. We maintain the honor in things built, in beers crafted by hand and poured by the people. We hold the line.
Every time.
